name: Mecha Battle:Tactics
description:
Fancy Mecha
The user-friendly mechanism allows you to easily collect limited Mechas. Hundreds of super cool Mechas are waiting for you to collect!

Idle Battle
You only need to invest less fragmented time and energy every day to experience fun and pleasure of the game.

Guild Research
Gather your fellow commanders, learn Guild skills together, and dominate the Guild War, so that you will no longer be alone in this adventure!

Say no to grinding
Don't want to upgrade from scratch? The Data Center helps you get rid of the troubles of development, upgrade one Mecha so your team can share its level, save materials and let you say goodbye to the grinding!
